name: handlebars-net
description: Guidance for Handlebars.NET template engine for .NET. USE FOR: logic-less HTML templating, email template rendering, code generation templates, report formatting, Mustache-compatible templates with helpers and partials. DO NOT USE FOR: sandboxed user-generated templates (use DotLiquid), full C# expression templates (use Razor), complex data transformations, server-side view rendering in ASP.NET.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
